trust.title: Trusted Relationships

greeting.title: Message from Management
greeting.name: Yoshihisa Okamoto
greeting.content1: Our company was founded in May 1921 as a tomato sauce processor. Since then, we have established ourselves as one of the top brands in fruit processing products, including mandarin oranges and peaches. Under our beloved OK mark, we have received widespread support from various sectors, including school meal programs.
greeting.content2: The trends surrounding 'food' are constantly changing with the times. We firmly grasp these temporal changes and continue our day-and-night improvement efforts from ingredient procurement to processing and distribution to deliver products that satisfy our customers.
greeting.content3: Moving forward, we will continue to strive for improved manufacturing technology based on the high trust and achievements cultivated since our founding, contributing to the development of healthy and prosperous dietary habits. We sincerely ask for your continued support and patronage.
greeting.content4: We sincerely appreciate your continued support and patronage as we move forward.

history.title: Company History
history.subtitle: Our journey through the years

timeline.description: Chiyomatsu Okamoto founded a tomato sauce processing business in Naruocho, Minami-ku, Nagoya
Started manufacturing various jams and fish canned products in addition to tomato ketchup and sauces
Reorganized as a corporation with capital of 1,000 thousand yen
Relocated headquarters and factory to current location. Began full-scale production of fruit and vegetable canned products
Built a new factory on the same premises. Increased capital to 12,000 thousand yen
Built a 2-story reinforced concrete new factory at the current location. Increased capital to 24,000 thousand yen
Completed automated mushroom production line (salt preservation recovery, first in Japan)
Introduced computer-controlled large rotary retort sterilizer
Built 3-story new factory and 4-story headquarters office at current location
Introduced automatic retort pouch filling line
Introduced X-ray foreign matter removal equipment
Introduced continuous IQF (Individual Quick Freezing) line. Started manufacturing frozen fruits and vegetables
Yoshihisa Okamoto became President & Representative Director
Built 2-story steel-frame new factory (North Factory) adjacent to headquarters
Introduced retort pouch automatic filling line. Operating as Toas Co., Ltd. Nagoya Factory
Complete renewal of mandarin orange acid treatment line
Introduced cup dessert production line. Operating as Toas Co., Ltd. Nagoya Factory

history.summaryDescription: Since our founding in 1921, we have continued to innovate and adapt to changing times, consistently providing products beloved by our customers.

mikan.title: Mandarin Orange
mikan.description: Fresh mandarin oranges harvested at peak season are carefully processed by removing peels, seeds, and membranes, then preserved segment by segment in light syrup-preserved format. Enjoy the enhanced fruit flavor in every bite.

domesticCan.name: Domestic Mandarin Orange #1 Can (L/M) (Light Syrup)
domesticCan.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic mandarin orange canned products

pouche1kg.name: Mandarin Orange 1kg Pouch
pouche1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved Chinese mandarin orange pouch type

domesticPouch1kg.name: Domestic Mandarin Orange 1kg Pouch
domesticPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic mandarin orange pouch type

chineseCan.name: Chinese Mandarin Orange #1 Can
chineseCan.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved Chinese mandarin orange canned products

peach.title: Yellow Peach
peach.description: Domestic yellow peaches and premium Greek yellow peaches are processed by removing pits and peels, then conveniently diced. Preserved in light syrup-preserved format to enjoy the natural deliciousness of the fruit flesh.

domesticCanDiced.name: Domestic Yellow Peach Diced #1 Can
domesticCanDiced.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic yellow peach diced cut canned products

domesticPouch1kg.name: Domestic Yellow Peach Diced 1kg Pouch
domesticPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic yellow peach diced cut pouch type

greekPouch1kg.name: Yellow Peach Diced 1kg Pouch
greekPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved Greek yellow peach diced cut pouch type

tomato.title: Tomato
tomato.description: Domestic tomatoes harvested at peak season are processed by removing cores and peeling, then preserved in squeezed tomato juice. No water is added during manufacturing, capturing the fresh flavor of domestic tomatoes. Available in diced cuts as well as rare whole types.

domesticWhole.name: Domestic Tomato Whole #1 Can
domesticWhole.description: Rare whole type for domestic tomatoes

mushroom.title: Mushroom
mushroom.description: Crisp and flavorful mushrooms are thinly sliced. We offer domestic varieties processed immediately after harvest, as well as mushrooms from major production areas in Europe and China. *Large volume frozen types (whole/sliced) are also available.

domesticSlicedPouch.name: Domestic Mushroom Sliced 1kg Pouch
domesticSlicedPouch.description: Easy-to-use sliced domestic mushroom pouch type

chineseSlicedCan.name: Mushroom Sliced #1 Can
chineseSlicedCan.description: Easy-to-use sliced Chinese mushroom canned products

europeanSlicedPouch.name: Mushroom Sliced (European Ingredients) 1kg Pouch
europeanSlicedPouch.description: Easy-to-use sliced Dutch mushroom pouch type

chineseSlicedPouch.name: Mushroom Sliced 1kg Pouch
chineseSlicedPouch.description: Easy-to-use sliced Chinese mushroom pouch type

pineapple.title: Pineapple
pineapple.description: Sweet and aromatic Thai pineapples are cut into bite-sized pieces. Preserved in light syrup-preserved format to enjoy the natural deliciousness of the fruit flesh.

tidbitsPouch1kg.name: Pineapple Tidbits 1kg Pouch
tidbitsPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved Thai pineapple bite-sized cut pouch type

mixedFruits.title: Mixed Fruits
mixedFruits.description: Mixed bite-sized pineapple (Thai), yellow peach (Greek), and mandarin orange (domestic). Eliminates the need to prepare multiple fruits separately.

mixedPouch1kg.name: Mixed Fruits 1kg Pouch
mixedPouch1kg.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved pineapple, yellow peach, and mandarin orange mixed bite-sized cut pouch type

specs.ingredients: Pineapple (Thailand), yellow peach (Greece), mandarin orange (domestic), sugar

mikanPulp.title: Others (Mandarin Orange Pulp)
mikanPulp.description: Domestic 'granular mandarin orange' pulp. Syrup-preserved pulp used as ingredients for beverages, yogurt, jelly, and other products.

domesticPulpCan.name: Domestic Mandarin Orange Pulp #5 Can
domesticPulpCan.description: Light sweetness syrup-preserved domestic mandarin orange granular canned products

frozen.title: Frozen Fruits
frozen.description: Frozen fruits featuring 'domestic fruits,' 'peeled,' and 'syrup-preserved' quality. We handle everything from fresh fruit procurement (direct from production areas) and primary processing to final products consistently. Domestic fruits are peeled, syrup-preserved, and individually frozen piece by piece.

frozenMikan1kg.name: OK Frozen Fruits Domestic Mandarin Orange 1kg
frozenMikan1kg.description: Syrup-preserved domestic mandarin orange individually frozen for easy use

chillMikan110g.name: Chill Mandarin Orange 110g
chillMikan110g.description: Syrup-preserved domestic mandarin orange individually frozen for easy use

frozenPeach1kg.name: OK Frozen Fruits Domestic Yellow Peach 1kg
frozenPeach1kg.description: Syrup-preserved domestic yellow peach individually frozen for easy use

frozenLemon700g.name: OK Frozen Fruits Domestic Lemon Sliced 700g
frozenLemon700g.description: Domestic lemon sliced and frozen for easy use

news.title: News & Updates
news.subtitle: Stay informed with our latest news and announcements

content.intro: Okamoto Foods Co., Ltd. obtained JFS-B Standard compliance certification operated by the Japan Food Safety Management Association (JFSM) in March 2024.

section1.title: About JFS-B Standards
section1.content: The JFS-B standard is an internationally harmonized food safety management standard originating from Japan, consisting of three requirement layers: Food Safety Management System (FSM), Hazard Control (HACCP), and Good Manufacturing Practice (GMP).

section2.title: Our Future Commitment
section2.content: We will continue to maintain this system and strive to further strengthen our quality control system so that we can continue to deliver safe and secure products to our customers.

footer.description: We deliver safety, deliciousness, and smiles. With over a century of expertise and dedication, we provide safe and reliable foods made with carefully selected domestic ingredients.
footer.copyright: © 2024 Okamoto Foods Co., Ltd. All rights reserved.

features.title: Commitment to Domestic Ingredients
features.subtitle: We implement contract cultivation and other initiatives to deliver safe, reliable, and delicious products.
features.qualityTitle: Good products can only be made from good ingredients
features.qualityDescription: Having produced agricultural canned products for many years, we understand this principle better than anyone.
features.rawMaterialsDescription: Our domestic ingredient products include mandarin oranges, tomatoes, peaches, and more. Rather than simply buying and selling ingredients, our product development begins by working closely with producers to build trust relationships and determine how to consistently create high-quality ingredients.
features.procurementCapabilityDescription: We have strong connections with production areas and markets based on years of experience and trust, providing us with powerful procurement capabilities for various domestic agricultural ingredients.
features.procurementCapabilitySecond: Through advanced initiatives such as cultivation contracts for specific seed varieties with producers and our own mandarin orange cultivation, we have established a system for stable medium- to long-term ingredient procurement.
features.cultivationSubtitle: In-house mandarin orange cultivation (Group joint project farm) started in 2021
features.cultivationDescription: In collaboration with our group company Toas Co., Ltd., we began planting mandarin orange seedlings in March 2021.
features.projectPurpose1: • Stable procurement of ingredients with suitable processing varieties
features.projectPurpose2: • Local production for local consumption and food education initiatives
features.seasonPackDescription: Various carefully cultivated domestic agricultural ingredients are processed while maintaining their fresh state.
features.processingCapabilityDescription: We have proprietary equipment and production lines for each product category, establishing a system for stable production of domestic agricultural processed products.
features.foodSafetyDescription: To deliver products of 'reliable quality' and 'safety and security' to our customers, we maintain high awareness of product quality, focusing on ingredients and quality in our product development.
features.foodSafetySecond: We also listen to customer feedback, making 'safety and security' our top priority and quickly implementing improvements throughout the company to enhance quality.
features.qualityManagementDescription: We have extensive technical expertise and manufacturing experience in agricultural processing. Beyond safety and nutritional components, we establish the safety of all products through strict quality testing and thorough quality management to ensure stable product quality and deliver safe, reliable products.
features.qualityManagementSecond: In product manufacturing, we check hygiene management conditions and verify that each manufacturing process is implemented according to specified procedures. We also conduct various tests including sensory, physicochemical, and microbiological testing, establishing a system where only products meeting specifications are shipped.

banner.description: From our founding in 1921 to the present day. Discover our story woven with unwavering dedication and new challenges toward the next century.

domesticCommitment.title: Commitment to Domestic Ingredients
domesticCommitment.subtitle: We implement contract cultivation and other initiatives to deliver safe, reliable, and delicious products.

philosophy.title: Good products can only be made from good ingredients
philosophy.description: Having produced agricultural canned products for many years, we understand this principle better than anyone.
philosophy.content: Our domestic ingredient products include mandarin oranges, tomatoes, peaches, and more. Rather than simply buying and selling ingredients, our product development begins by working closely with producers to build trust relationships and determine how to consistently create high-quality ingredients.

procurement.title: Domestic Ingredient Procurement Capability
procurement.description: We have strong connections with production areas and markets based on years of experience and trust, providing us with powerful procurement capabilities for various domestic agricultural ingredients.
procurement.content: Through advanced initiatives such as cultivation contracts for specific seed varieties with producers and our own mandarin orange cultivation, we have established a system for stable medium- to long-term ingredient procurement.

ownCultivation.title: In-House Mandarin Orange Cultivation
ownCultivation.subtitle: In-house mandarin orange cultivation (Group joint project farm) started in 2021
ownCultivation.description: In collaboration with our group company Toas Co., Ltd., we began planting mandarin orange seedlings in March 2021.

details.area: Farm Area: 13 hectares (approximately 2.7 times the size of Bantelin Dome Nagoya)

purposes.title: Project Purpose
items: Stable procurement of ingredients with suitable processing varieties
Local production for local consumption and food education initiatives

seasonPack.title: Season Pack
seasonPack.description: Various carefully cultivated domestic agricultural ingredients are processed while maintaining their fresh state.

processingCapability.title: Agricultural Processing Capability
processingCapability.description: We have proprietary equipment and production lines for each product category, establishing a system for stable production of domestic agricultural processed products.

foodSafety.title: Food Safety
foodSafety.description: To deliver products of 'reliable quality' and 'safety and security' to our customers, we maintain high awareness of product quality, focusing on ingredients and quality in our product development.
foodSafety.content: We also listen to customer feedback, making 'safety and security' our top priority and quickly implementing improvements throughout the company to enhance quality.

qualityManagement.title: Quality Management
qualityManagement.description: We have extensive technical expertise and manufacturing experience in agricultural processing. Beyond safety and nutritional components, we establish the safety of all products through strict quality testing and thorough quality management to ensure stable product quality and deliver safe, reliable products.
qualityManagement.process: In product manufacturing, we check hygiene management conditions and verify that each manufacturing process is implemented according to specified procedures.
qualityManagement.testing: We also conduct various tests including sensory, physicochemical, and microbiological testing, establishing a system where only products meeting specifications are shipped.

foodTable.subtitle1: Safe and delicious flavors for daily meals.
foodTable.subtitle2: Our fruits serve as a bridge that connects smiles.
foodTable.description1: From school lunches to family dining tables, Okamoto Foods' products continue to be loved nationwide.
foodTable.description2: Each product, filled with our dedication, adds color to everyday life.

recruit.title: Career Opportunities
recruit.subtitle: Current Job Openings
recruit.qualificationMessage: We welcome applications from those who have gratitude and respect, and are willing to take on challenges and change.

companyDescription.paragraph1: We continue to deliver safe, reliable, and delicious foods with smiles, focusing on processing domestic fruits and vegetables. For this purpose, we seek people who can respect all stakeholders, including customers and agricultural producers, as well as colleagues, with gratitude, and who are not satisfied with the status quo but constantly take on challenges and changes.
companyDescription.paragraph2: Of course, everyone has many unknowns and concerns at first. We will prepare the working stage through OJT education, follow-up interviews, and various communications. Work is day shift only, and we support the realization of work-life balance.
companyDescription.paragraph3: Currently, we have a friendly workplace atmosphere with about 80 employees. We will provide solid support, so you can work with confidence!

recruit.companySlogan: Together with us... FOOD FOR YOUR SMILE!

application.title: HOW TO APPLY
application.instructions1: Those wishing to apply, please apply using the form below or by phone.
application.instructions2: Company information sessions and recruitment tests will be conducted regularly until capacity is reached.

missionSection.title: Okamoto Foods Mission
missionSection.content: Okamoto Foods provides safe, reliable, and delicious food, contributing to the creation of a healthy and happy society.

dreamSection.title: Okamoto Foods Dream
dreamSection.content: Okamoto Foods will become a company that can deliver happiness to all people for the next 100 years.

smile.title: SMILE
points: (1) Okamoto Foods creates safe, reliable, and delicious food that brings smiles to our customers.
(2) Okamoto Foods strives to create a workplace where employees can work with smiles.

gratitude.title: GRATITUDE
points: (1) Okamoto Foods never forgets our gratitude to our customers.
(2) Okamoto Foods never forgets our gratitude to nature's blessings and our farming partners.

health.title: HEALTH
points: (1) Okamoto Foods strives to develop and manufacture products that promote health by bringing out the best in ingredients.
(2) Okamoto Foods creates a healthy corporate structure and contributes to society as a good corporate citizen.

domesticCommitment.title: Commitment to Domestic Ingredients
domesticCommitment.subtitle: We implement contract cultivation and other initiatives to deliver safe, reliable, and delicious products.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.description: Good products can only be made from good ingredients
philosophy.content: Having produced agricultural canned products for many years, we understand this principle better than anyone. This is why we are committed to domestic ingredients and work directly with farmers to ensure the highest quality.

procurement.title: Procurement Capability
procurement.content: Through long-term relationships with trusted farmers across Japan, we ensure consistent supply of premium quality fruits and vegetables. Our procurement network spans from Hokkaido to Kyushu, allowing us to select the best seasonal produce.

ownCultivation.title: Own Cultivation Initiative
ownCultivation.subtitle: Direct control over quality from farm to factory
ownCultivation.description: To ensure the highest quality and safety standards, we operate our own cultivation facilities where we can control every aspect of the growing process.

purposes.title: Cultivation Purposes
items: Quality control from seed to harvest
Development of new varieties and cultivation methods
Ensuring stable supply of premium ingredients

seasonPack.title: Season Pack Processing
seasonPack.description: We process fruits at their peak season to capture maximum flavor and nutritional value. Our season pack method preserves the natural taste and texture of fresh fruits year-round.

processingCapability.title: Processing Capability
processingCapability.description: Our state-of-the-art facilities can handle large-scale processing while maintaining artisanal quality standards.

foodSafety.title: Food Safety
foodSafety.content: We implement HACCP-based food safety management throughout our entire operation, from raw material receiving to final product shipment. Regular inspections and quality audits ensure consistent safety standards.

qualityManagement.title: Quality Management
qualityManagement.description: Rigorous quality control at every step
qualityManagement.process: Our quality control process includes incoming material inspection, in-process monitoring, and final product testing.
qualityManagement.testing: Advanced testing equipment and trained quality assurance staff ensure every product meets our exacting standards.
